mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT tmsd.*,ts.storage_name as move_storage_name,ts1.storage_name as move_to_storage_name,tsd.inventory_number FROM dms.tb_move_storage_detail tmsd LEFT JOIN dms.tb_storage ts ON ts.id=tmsd.fk_move_storage_id LEFT JOIN dms.tb_storage ts1 ON ts1.id=tmsd.fk_move_to_storage_id LEFT JOIN dms.tb_storage_detail tsd ON ts.id=tsd.fk_storage_id WHERE tmsd.batch_no=tsd.batch_no AND tmsd.product_item_number=tsd.product_item_number ) t

SELECT * FROM( SELECT tmsd.*,ts.storage_name as move_storage_name,ts1.storage_name as move_to_storage_name,tsd.inventory_number FROM dms.tb_move_storage_detail tmsd LEFT JOIN dms.tb_storage ts ON ts.id=tmsd.fk_move_storage_id LEFT JOIN dms.tb_storage ts1 ON ts1.id=tmsd.fk_move_to_storage_id LEFT JOIN dms.tb_storage_detail tsd ON ts.id=tsd.fk_storage_id WHERE tmsd.batch_no=tsd.batch_no AND tmsd.product_item_number=tsd.product_item_number ) t
limit #{offset},#{pagesize}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT tmsd.*,ts.storage_name as move_storage_name,ts1.storage_name as move_to_storage_name,tsd.inventory_number FROM dms.tb_move_storage_detail tmsd LEFT JOIN dms.tb_storage ts ON ts.id=tmsd.fk_move_storage_id LEFT JOIN dms.tb_storage ts1 ON ts1.id=tmsd.fk_move_to_storage_id LEFT JOIN dms.tb_storage_detail tsd ON ts.id=tsd.fk_storage_id WHERE tmsd.batch_no=tsd.batch_no AND tmsd.product_item_number=tsd.product_item_number ) t
mapper.delete: delete from dms.tb_move_storage_detail where fk_move_storage_id=#{fk_move_storage_id} and fk_move_to_storage_id=#{fk_move_to_storage_id} and product_item_number = #{product_item_number} and batch_no=#{batch_no}
